core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Soft Utility warmth.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'snappy' and 'directed'.
Content is King: Data density without clutter.
Contrast: High contrast for readability, subtle contrast for hierarchy.
design_philosophy.vibe: Professional, Dense, Clarity-First, but with 'Electric' accents.

usage_rules: Headings (h1-h3): Manrope, Tight tracking (-0.02em). Use 'Black' weight for Hero text.
Body: IBM Plex Sans. Relaxed leading (1.6).
Data/Numbers: JetBrains Mono. Tabular nums for tables.

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, Key Metrics

secondary.name: Slate Blue
secondary.usage: Secondary buttons, backgrounds for active items

rules: Tinted Grey Rule: Never use pure #000000 or #FFFFFF. Use Slate (Blue-Grey) scales.
Dark Mode Strategy: Use 'Black-on-Black' layering. Background #0B0C15, Cards #161821, Borders #2D3142.
Gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle 'glow' gradients behind key elements.

borders.active_effect: The 'Tracing Beam' - glowing border on active inputs/cards.

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on the main background to kill digital flatness (opacity 0.03).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border shadow-sm

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, w-64, border-r border-border bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-sm
navigation.topbar: Sticky top, h-16, border-b border-border bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md z-50

layouts.auth: Split screen. Left: Branding/Art (50%), Right: Form (50%). Mobile: Stacked.
layouts.project_detail: Header (Title + Actions) + Tabs (Overview, Tasks, Timeline) + Content Area.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use APCA where possible.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on ALL interactive elements (ring-2 ring-primary).
accessibility.aria: Use aria-label for icon-only buttons. Use semantic HTML (nav, main, aside).

images.description: Abstract blue/white space for light mode hero or auth background.

media.icons: lucide-react (Default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

3d_libraries.charts: Recharts (Standard but styled). Custom Tooltips are MANDATORY.
3d_libraries.interactive: Framer Motion for layout transitions. No heavy 3D needed for this dashboard to maintain performance.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Theme: Implement a ThemeProvider using 'next-themes' or similar logic for system/light/dark toggle.
3. Components: Use the provided Shadcn components but OVERRIDE the default styling in 'globals.css' or via 'cn()' to match the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' archetype.
5. Data: Mock data should be realistic. Use the avatars provided.
6. Testing: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 where you'd normally use p-4.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click. Cards should lift on hover.
Empty States: Never leave a list empty. Show a creative placeholder or illustration.
